title: Yakuza Changes Name, Announces 3 Big New Games - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.14.22
description:
Blessing and Greg talk about all of the Yakuza *cough* excuse me, Like A Dragon announcements! They also recap the State of Play and talk about Deathloop coming to Xbox finally??

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:56 - Housekeeping

A new Gamescast went up yesterday and it’s our breakdown of that PlayStation State of Play. You can catch that up on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames as the second half of our live reactions and on the Gamescast podcast feed.

A new PS I Love You XOXO is up right now! Greg and Janet are joined by Gamespot’s Tamoor Hussain to talk about his hands on with PlayStation VR 2. You can catch that on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.

A new Xcast is up right now! The crew talks about Bonnie Ross’ departure and the future of Halo – plus Greg gives a mini-review for You Suck at Parking. You can catch that on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.

The Roper Report  -

00:06:00 - We got a bunch of Yakuza news
00:20:35 - PlayStation State of Play Recap
00:45:19 - Ad
00:47:28 - Ads for Deathloop have started appearing on Xbox
00:49:58 - 343 is reportedly losing another member of its leadership team
00:52:31 - David Harbour will star in Gran Turismo
00:55:28 - Out today
01:01:14 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless & Tim
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
